startup_text:
The owners of the _ residence have recently gone missing. You have been hired to track them down. Your first stop is their abandonned manor on the edge of town.
You approach a strange home with cobwebs covering the porch. Curiousity overtaking you, you reach for the door handle and pull. It's ...open. After a few cautious steps inside, the door slams behind you. You pull on the door to no avail. It's locked tight. I guess there is no way out but through.

entryway.description: You enter a dimly lit foyer. You step onto a small stained rug that covers the creaky floor boards. There is a small built-in bench to your right, next to an unused coat rack. There is a door on the wall directly in front of you.

ballroom.description: You step into a large ballroom. Two suits of armor flank either side of the south doorway. There is a large iron chandelier above you illuniating the room in candlelight along with a few small torches hanging on the wall. There is a door on the north wall, east wall and the west wall.

office.description: A large grand piano stands to your left. In front of you there is a large desk surrouned by a few armchairs and a small couch. A small table along the northern wall has a half-played chess game still set up.

dining_room.description: A large dining table sits under another iron chandelier. Light drifts in from the large front-facing windows. The table's been set, but you can tell from the dust that no one has been here for a long time.

library.description: Before you is a dusty library. There are rows of shelves filled with books and even more stacked up on the floor. There is a cozy fireplace along the back wall surrounded by a few armchairs. A small bit of sunlight driffs in through the dusty windows.

kitchen.description: A simple kitchen. The shelves are barren but there is a closed cabinet on the left wall that may contain something useful.

storeroom.description: This once well-stocked storeroom is barren. A few items liter the shelves.

storeroom_stairs_1.description: A cramped dusty staircase decends from this level.

storeroom_stairs_0.description: A cramped dusty staircase ascends from this level.

wine_room.description: A large dusty wine room. Barrel racks line the walls, but all are empty.

tunnel.description: A dark, damp tunnel. The air is thick and musty. You can barely make out a faint light to the east. As you apporach, torches flank a large ornate door. You can hear a light chanting from beyond the door.

summoning_chamber.description: A large circular chamber. Strange symbols are drawn on the floor in what looks like dried blood. The air is thick with the smell of sulfur and burnt incense.

cultist_1.description: A figure in a dark robe, hunched over the altar. Their eyes glow with an otherworldly light.

cultist_2.description: A figure in a dark robe, hunched over the altar. Their eyes glow with an otherworldly light.

cultist_3.description: A figure in a dark robe, hunched over the altar. Their eyes glow with an otherworldly light.

summoning_chamber.combat_init_text: Three cultists with bowed heads surround a center altar. The cultists turn to face you, their eyes glowing with an otherworldly light. They raise their hands, ready to attack!

sword.description: A small, sharp sword. Equip this item to boost your attack.

armor.description: A squeky set of armor. Equip this item to boost your defense.

old_key.description: A small rusty key. Use this item to unlock a door.

knife.description: A simple kitchen knife. Equip to boost your attack.

healing_potion.description: A small red vial labeled healing potion. Equip to restore HP.

sigil.description: A small sigil on a scrap of parchment. It seems to depict a doorway. When you hold it, see the outline of a hidden exit in the wine room apprear on the south wall. Use this item to reveal the hidden exit.
